website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for an exceptional pool ball set will find their match in this premium-quality option.
pros: Set is regulation-size for professional or leisurely gaming
Construction is resistant to cracking and scratches
cons: Some owners have complained of the set chipping over time

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Balls!
customer_reviews.text: Nice balls! Definitely worth the investment, especially if, like me, you are using the ones that came with the kit that came with the table. Put those balls away. Get these balls out and play with them!!! The action is so much better, the spin, the connection, the feel and the vision of the movement, every aspect is noticeably better and impressive. Take the plunge, it’s a worthy investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazombie

customer_reviews.title: Good, But.......
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the under $50.00 balls, and the over $125.00 balls. The Aramith Balls definitely have a better shine, and play, but both have shown gouges/scratch marks after just a few days of play. Before I owned my own table, I used to play 3 to 4 times per week at my local pool hall, and their pool balls get abused much more than mine do, and they do not show the wear that these do. Let me be clear after my rant, these balls hold up much better than the cheaper balls.....if you are serious about your play, get this set, or the more expensive set
customer_reviews.author: Ken Brown

customer_reviews.title: Aramith - Simply Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply the best performing pool balls we've ever had. Crisp, clear colors! A satisfying "snick" when ball impacts ball. Sort of like that solid car door closing sound that is so rare today, these balls sound right when you play. And they play very well, too. The literature accompanying the balls states that we could expect them to last up to five times longer than traditional polymer balls. We've got many years of games to play before we can comment on that, but so far, so good! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brower

customer_reviews.title: Perfect roll, sound, and shine
customer_reviews.text: Just had table and rails replaced with professional cloth over them on 30 year old Brunswick Hawthone 8 ft table. If you're going to spend close to a thousand for the best, couldn't see not spending extra for top quality balls. These are the cheapest phenolic resin balls Aramith makes and with the leveling on my table roll flawlessly on the long slow shots. Nice to play with the best, don't skimp as you'll regret it.
customer_reviews.author: BobEvans

customer_reviews.title: Aramith Preminum Pool Table Balls
customer_reviews.text: These pool balls exceeded my expectations. I was very pleased with the coloring and quality of each ball. Each ball was made consistent with one another. Cue ball outstanding. Supplier shipped on time and with excellent packaging. I did not realize my oem pool balls were so poor in quality. Rolls and rebounds better. I would recommend this product for any pool table player... rd
customer_reviews.author: rd

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my table.
customer_reviews.text: These are a little pricy, especially for an amateur like myself for home use, but there is a definite difference than the ones that came with my table. And so much shinier, with brighter whites and colors. This table is in my game room (Basement), but gets used most every day and once a week have 7 buddies over to shoot 8 ball for a few hours or more, and have a few beers, or more. Now as I get better at this game I really appreciate this set of cue balls more and more.
customer_reviews.author: William Horton

customer_reviews.title: Much better than "kit" balls that came with the table
customer_reviews.text: Already notice the difference after only a few games. Balls roll very true. I am making shots that I missed using the cheap balls that came with my table. For example I can hug the bumper in straight line all the way down the side without the ball moving away from the bumper as with my prior set. I do wish they were not so "blurry". I get that is part of the coating process. That is the first thing that people notice.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Life 2018

customer_reviews.title: Second time replacement wrong! Now I believe this is on purpose packages are re-labeled!
customer_reviews.text: Second time in a row entire week fake product wrong product listed. The product was relabeled repackaged fake and half the price of the product that is described. This needs to be fixed. Very disappointed it is so frustrating. I know that it’s just pool balls but when you’re buying the most expensive ones or close and you get ones that are half that or fake twice in a row it is mind boggling.
customer_reviews.author: G19Man

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Finish
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Great value for the semi serious home use player. Beautiful finish too!!! I did replace a 20 year old set of cheap Sportcraft balls with these, so the realized step up in performance and appearance is amazing. I will never let discount balls roll on my felt again after seeing the difference in paying a little more for the good stuff. After shopping around, the Premium set seems to be the best value per dollar spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These billiards play great. I had no idea how badly worn out my old set was until I put these on the table. The cue ball takes english so well that I'm finding I have to re-learn my cue placement so as not to send it off in an unintended direction. I was skeptical of the other reviews about these online, but after having played with them for a few weeks I am now a believer. Definitely worth the price of admission.
customer_reviews.author: FISHTAIL

customer_reviews.title: Huge Difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Dynamo Coin Op table and the balls that came with it were pretty much what you would find in any barroom table. These balls are nice and shiny and you can tell the difference in quality as soon as you hold them in your hand but the real difference can be heard as soon as you break the balls, Huge Difference...They play better, look better and feel better...Very Happy with the purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Step-up Replacement Set
customer_reviews.text: I decided to splurge a bit replacing the set (don't recall vendor) that came with my 9' table ten years ago. The Aramith balls are good-looking and play beautifully. The balls seem to have more spring, and english is that little extra. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Librovore

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and pretty! And they play awesome too!
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been playing on a poorly felted, used table with a set of cheap $20 balls. Decided to get these as my old cheapys were chipped and looking a bit rugged. And WOW. I've always told myself that the quality of the ball wouldn't affect how well the game played, boy was I wrong!! Game one out of the box I could tell the difference. They roll better, they hit better, they rebound better. If you're like me, playing some cheap balls because you don't think it would make a difference, take the leap! You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Giese Jr

customer_reviews.title: Consistent roll and size with a shiny ball set.
customer_reviews.text: The Legion Hall now has a nice set of pool balls. The pool table is used by 3-ball, and 8-ball players mostly. Both have commented that these clean up easy, have a consistent roll, and bounce more evenly against each other.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Big difference
customer_reviews.text: We had been playing with the balls that came with the pool table. I didn’t realize how bad they were until we got the aramith premium balls. Huge difference, total game changer. Well worth the money. Roll, bounce, breaks, and accuracy are significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: mike liotta

customer_reviews.title: Have chips on some of the balls
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these balls I expected no problems but I have small chips on a few balls that I feel shouldn't have happened. Our table is for home use and not played on very much, only played on by adults, and the balls are well taken care of so these balls should not have chips.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Aaramith's Duramith technology is the best Hands down!!!
customer_reviews.text: These Aramith Tournament Black pool balls are the best that Aramith made ordered them one day came the next 5 hours a head of time I've been playing at the local pool hall these are the balls that i only wanna play with when they are available to use the true rolla and english ball control action is amazing i would definitely recommend anyone to pay the money for these they are very pricey but you won't regret the investment it won't tear or burn your felt up and balls will never discolor these balll will definitely last a life time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of Balls
customer_reviews.text: These make that sound, that little clink or click that you expect and want to hear. Huge difference from the standard everyday balls, these are the real thing, the best balls, pro balls...try em, hold em, feel em, your gonna love em
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Best Balls, Ever.....
customer_reviews.text: This set is genuine, plays like a dream, and is well worth the money, in my opinion..... I love the way these roll, as straight as you can drive them, or in any fashion you send them, toward the pockets, towards other balls, or around them, if you are able to make them do so.....
customer_reviews.author: Rod Graham

customer_reviews.title: one set of balls to rule them all.
customer_reviews.text: These balls...are better looking in person than in the pictures...they sound great, play great, look great. Theyre absolutely amazing...definately not dissapointed in my purchase. A little dissapointed that I spent 150 when theyre 122 but they shipped in 2 days, when I was expecting 2 weeks. My family loves the new balls. When you compare these Aramith balls to the cheap 20 dollar set that comes with a table, the brilliance will blow you away. These roll straight, ricochet off the rails faster than a bullet, and man that sound is great. Highly recommend for your pool table investments.
customer_reviews.author: Gytole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing balls!
customer_reviews.text: These balls turned my average table into a near pool hall quality table. Balanced and weighted makes all the difference. I have no doubt, for balls and beer...GO BELGIAN!
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: I used to have the Aramith Continental set but after heavy use one of the balls chipped so I'm hoping these can hold up a little better.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use on my weekly pool league and for play after league and so far they are performing well. I used to have the Aramith Continental set but after heavy use one of the balls chipped so I'm hoping these can hold up a little better.
customer_reviews.author: KSF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great pool balls! I got this set after it was recommended to me by a friend. They work well and look good too. They have not lost their shine even after many many many games played.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Crespo

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality billiard balls. Very shiny which reduces felt burn. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Traderfjp

customer_reviews.title: Aramith Duramith - evidence that you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: These billiard balls are incredible! Highest quality, play beautifully, solid sounding, and so far no marks, scratches, or issues. Certainly worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pool balls. Rolls true. Shiny. Colorful. Solid and weight feels just right.
customer_reviews.author: T. Estrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: These balls are nice and round rolls really well paired with my simon cloth
customer_reviews.author: kai

customer_reviews.title: Simply Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply fantastic; better look, better "action" better play than my previous balls. Also, a fantastic value. I love these, and they changed my game.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality for price
customer_reviews.text: These balls will make you see English talking back to you. Beautiful well-balanced & made to last. They hit perfect, accurate & pronounce any spin. 10 stars 🌟🤙🏼💪🏼
customer_reviews.author: BGreen

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Billiard Balls
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for a while now. They roll true and are a high quality. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reedt

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set of billiard balls
customer_reviews.text: These do cost a bit, but you get what you pay for - these look great, are perfectly balanced and play so very well. Solid feel, sound and playability. If your serious about your pool playing you have probably purchased a nice cue stick, so complete the package with quality billiard balls.
customer_reviews.author: wilddog

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Action
customer_reviews.text: Love these pool balls. They are beautiful and have a lot of action. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, quality product. I'm a recreational home player who also plays league off and on. These are perfect for me. Love Aramith!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful billiard balls! My husband was concerned that our pool table slate was warped, but after using these, it is clear that the problem was the balls that came with our pool table. He loves this set and says that he can tell a significant difference. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NC Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Spend the extra and get a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought a $50 set off of here and compared to these balls they were crap. I have since returned the other balls and kept these. Just save the hassle and buy these instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for serious pool players.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my husband. They are very nice quality. Believe it or not, but I do believe they have improved my game. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously nice balls.
customer_reviews.text: Total splurge, but so nice to play with high quality balls. Insert obvious joke here.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these balls
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these balls. Haven't used them terribly much, but they have a nice sound, roll great and look very nice!
customer_reviews.author: J. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made yet
customer_reviews.text: This set of cue balls that I bought in June have kept their shine since my purchase! I use a cloth one a month to keep their shine!! Now our new pool table is complete!! Best purchase I've made yet!! Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Waters

customer_reviews.title: Nice balls
customer_reviews.text: Very nice balls. Hard to say if they are that much better than some others, but I don't see any negative. Too early to say how long they will last. I'm a recreational player, so I expect they'll perform better than I expect and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Conger

customer_reviews.title: Bright and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love these pool balls. Beautiful shiny and bright oh my. Would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price I would have expected a little better quality. The balls have chipped a little, nothing major but I expected to be able to bounce these off a concrete floor with no damage (not that I did that), they chipped simply from regular play. Guess if I want chip free play I will have to invest a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Eric Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Missing ball
customer_reviews.text: Missing the 13 ball.. was labeled new/used and said original packaging was damaged. Didnt say ANYTHING ABOUT A MISSING BALL! Now i gota wait another week for a new set? The reason i ordered these was because of the $20 dollars off..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful, they're simply beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful, they're simply beautiful, just like the other reviews stated, if your have hesitation on these balls , I understand, but once you put them on your table you'll be very glad you purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan the Maintenance Man

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: great product - using on an 8 ft table - these balls roll smooth and true. They sound cool too when making a shot - not sure that's an intended feature lol.
customer_reviews.author: JH14

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Billiards Balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself as the last step in renovating my pool table and I could not be happier with them. They play so much better than my old beat up, mismatched set and look fantastic. My kids can tell they are quality and have completely stopped blasting the balls all around the table to make spectacular collisions and are now actually trying to play pool. I highly enjoy these and think you will too.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Allan

customer_reviews.title: Play is so much better.
customer_reviews.text: What a difference from the ones I received with the pool table. Play is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Play great so far
customer_reviews.text: If these hold up as advertised will probably never need another set
customer_reviews.author: dustincbr

customer_reviews.title: Chips seen after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought August 20,2018. After only 3 months of “occasional use” balls have small chips. Hoping for warranty return. I see one other customer with same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip off.
customer_reviews.text: Total rip off. Box taped closed. Obviously very cheap balls and not Aramith Premium. 2 cue balls and no 13 ball. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Jb4456

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball Action
customer_reviews.text: High Quality Balls; they do not leave ball marks on your cloth. Spend the extra money and buy these quality balls. You will be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The exact same pool balls that my Grandfather had from years ago. Excellent quality. I expect these to last a LONG time.
customer_reviews.author: KACRX

customer_reviews.title: Improve the game!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. Good bounce... nice colors... much better than the standard balls.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Newman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for serious pool players.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pool balls. I am serious player. Have 9 foot in my house. I play in local open/amatuer tournaments, as well as leagues. These are the perfect set of pool balls. Really happy with this purchase. I couldn't even imagine what the Super Aramith or Tourney balls play like because these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: BudFox

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best
customer_reviews.text: The best of the best. I can tell the difference from my cheep balls that came with my table. My pool game still sucks but the Aramith Tournament Balls sure look and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Johnson,III

customer_reviews.title: Better action and sound
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a big difference from the balls that came with my table. Better action and sound. These balls don't mark either.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: awesome balls
customer_reviews.text: these are the real deal. these are high quality pool balls for serious players. if you have done your homework, you know that these are almost the best balls you can get. but unless you are playing for a living or have plenty of disposable income, these are great balls for serious pool players.
customer_reviews.author: KRANZO

customer_reviews.title: Best balls worth the price
customer_reviews.text: If you're serious about your pool game then you know it helps to play using the best equipment available - This ball set is professional quality. Go ahead, spend the extra money to get the best...you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Shehan

customer_reviews.title: New balls are like a new table.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent upgrade for our local lodge leagues. You have no idea how much basic re-leveling and new balls can make.
customer_reviews.author: HaulinAshe

customer_reviews.title: Big balls
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great. Checked for chips or defects and checked for roundness using micrometer - all good. These balls are better than those cheap balls definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Makena1103

customer_reviews.title: Good balls
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this and really happy! Says he really can feel the difference between the old set and new one.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of cue balls, have an AMAZING sound on the break. Solid set for sure!
customer_reviews.author: fightenfire

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality and look. I was not sure about spending that much on balls. My shots are more consistent and my English on the balls is more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't use any other pool balls than these. Quality is top notch and will last for a generation.
customer_reviews.author: SPOTTS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Almost as good as the much more expensive balls we looked at. Work great for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: CLRL

customer_reviews.title: Great balls
customer_reviews.text: These pool balls are great! Quality colors, consistent weight, not easily marked. Great mid-high level choice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Quest

customer_reviews.title: Nice Balls!
customer_reviews.text: These are way better that the set I've had for years.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Buy With Confidence
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit concerned with other feedback but my fears were unfounded. The ball set was exactly what I expected. Brand new Duramith balls in the wrapper and box at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MidKnight Rider

customer_reviews.title: Dont burn your cloth and roll true.
customer_reviews.text: If you need balls that don't cause table burns and roll true, get these. You won't be disappointed. I wish I had known about the ins and outs of billiard balls opener.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The balls roll smoothly and bounce of the rails nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set of billiard balls
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set of billiard balls! Great look, high shine. Bright colors. Aramith Tournament balls are the best of the best. These balls play very well and seem to be holding their shine well.
customer_reviews.author: Amaz cust

customer_reviews.title: Aramith, the best is still the best
customer_reviews.text: 25 years ago we bought Aramith balls for our, then, new Brunswick Hawthorne pool table. The kids are long since through school and college with the table dormant for a long time until my Granddaughter played at Christmas. My pool interest renewed, I realized it was time to replace the original set. I knew it would be Aramith. I am happy I chose the Aramith Premium ball set. They are beautiful and roll true. Additionally, I recommend the Aramith 6 dot cue ball to really see what the cue ball is doing and Aramith Billiard Ball cleaner to keep the set's shine as new. I am back playing pool again. What else can one say?
customer_reviews.author: G. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A major improvement for my pool table.
customer_reviews.text: What a difference. I bought an expensive table and it came with cheap balls. These balls are elastic, balanced and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Columbia River

customer_reviews.title: Aramith is the only way to go; No reason to look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The #1 most important thing about your pool table is the professional installation. The #2 most important thing about your pool table is the ball set. Save $1000 on the table, spend $300 for top notch installation, $150 for quality balls, and pocket the rest. The rich colors and consistent performance you'll get with these balls is top flight. Far worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Walborn

customer_reviews.title: Great Balls!
customer_reviews.text: Great action. Nice crisp colors. More attractive than most sets on the market. Would buy again if the need ever arises! But since they last a lifetime I'm guessing I won't need to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley Face

customer_reviews.title: The best quality in the sport
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price. The best quality in the sport.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Step up your game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge step up from a common set of pool balls. We are new to billiards and could instantly tell the difference. I know that they are pricey, but definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lewen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These balls look Great and Play Great. So glad i got them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven G Hollowell

customer_reviews.title: Chipping
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for about 2-3 weeks and some of the balls are chipping. Going to try and do a return for a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Great balls
customer_reviews.text: Great balls, been almost a year and no damage from ground or heavy contact.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Teagarden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Balls are the best you will ever find. Amazing balance and roll
customer_reviews.author: MrBlu’s

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift for a Pool Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I recently got these balls for my boyfriend's home pool table. He noticed the quality of the balls from the first break. With these balls, pool becomes a game of finesse, not power, and shots with English are much more consistent as the balls react much more predictably. On a shot with draw, he was able to draw the cue ball across the table on a shot that with a lower-quality cue ball would have just drawn it a foot. The color of the balls is also very rich and bright, making it easy for even a non-player to appreciate the workmanship!
customer_reviews.author: Erin McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great playing, great looking, great sounding. Could not be more happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Balls
customer_reviews.text: What can I say these are the best pool balls you can buy in my opinion. The Premium are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: great balls, in aramith sealed box
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, great balls, in aramith sealed box. Would have liked the box to have been placed in a box though, as the packaging was fully visible as shipped and this is not an inexpensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Play so much better than regular billiard balls. Can't wait to purchase the carrying case. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: and just what I wanted - quality.. worth the bucks.. have been through the cheapies
customer_reviews.author: T R C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Product
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic pool balls. There really is a difference and you can tell by just looking at them. The balance and quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn G.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pool Balls
customer_reviews.text: What a difference a pool ball makes. Replaced the balls that came with the table because one of them broke. These play much better. It was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: perfect balls so far. they appear to be high quality! cue ball is great too, nice back spin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Never have I had the opportunity to play with perfect billiard balls...Until now! Never knew they could look so clean & shiny. I can even make better shots with them :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Nedweski

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and clean
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 sets... we have an 8 ft table that you see in bars with a quarter machine. Our pockets are the cheap plastic kind that have finishing nails in them to hold the pocket. We use one set for everyday use because the pockets scratch up these perfect balls. The other set for special occasions. Keep in mind if you have a bar table the que ball will go in with the other balls and not separate into the que ball return. You will need to buy a separate que ball.
customer_reviews.author: WiskiDave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These balls play like none other I've used. I didn't realize what I was missing, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: Product is every bit as I expected. Great experience and great price purchasing through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Manufacture
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best pool balls on the market. Very crisp and clean hit...and I recommend that you buy the polishing liquid and ball polisher to keep them clean and in mint condition for consistent play. These have the right feel, the right weight, and the right contact when I shoot with them.
customer_reviews.author: John Wilson

customer_reviews.title: awesome,
customer_reviews.text: this set is great. I highly recommend them. the last set of no name brand balls I had chipped on me during normal play so its nice to have a good set to practice on for league.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kehn

customer_reviews.title: True roll
customer_reviews.text: May not have improved my game, but certainly light years ahead of what I came with these table I bought. Get a truesnd consistent platform them. Delivery - freaking amazingly fast!
customer_reviews.author: Chief Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are much better than the standard set that came with our table. Excellent quality. Rich beautiful colors. I can FEEL the difference as well. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These balls are very high quality and they look great. They were in perfect condition when opened. I have gotten compliments from everyone who has played on my table on how good these balls roll.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for husband...
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so happy when he opened this. He ask how I knew which set to buy, that makes for 5 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

product_meta.title: Aramith Pure Phenolic Pool Balls Regulation Belgian Made Billiard Ball Set
feature_bullets: Complete set of 16 balls includes 8 solids, 7 stripes and a cue ball; Each ball is regulations size, measuring 2-1/4" in diameter
Crafted from the highest quality phenolic resin which provides exceptional scratch and impact resistance
Phenolic resin is proven to last up-to 5 times longer than balls made of polymers or polyester; Features the classic "numbers in the stripe" design
Aramith Premium billiard balls utilize Vitrotech technology; a heat-curing process offers maximum impact resistance, ensuring superior playability and durability
Designed with perfect roundness and balance, uniform weight and hardness, brilliant colors and a friction resistant roll; Ideal for billiard players of all skill levels
